ta.title: අත්අඩංගුවට ගත් ශෂීන්ද්‍ර රාජපක්ෂට අධිකරණයෙන් ලැබුණු නියෝගය මෙන්න
body_lines: முன்னாள் மாநில மந்திரி சஷிந்த்ரா ராஜபக்ஷம் 19 ஆம் தேதி வரை 19 ஆம் தேதி வரை ரிமாண்ட் செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளது.

en.title: Here is the order he received from the court who was arrested by the arrested Shashindra Rajapaksa
body_lines: Former State Minister Shashindra Rajapaksa has been remanded until the 19th to be remanded until the 19th.
